00008     template<typename T>
00009     class Stat
00010     {
00011             T mBase;
00012             T mModified;
00013 
00014         public:
00015 
00016             Stat() : mBase (0), mModified (0) {}
00017 
00018             const T& getBase() const
00019             {
00020                 return mBase;
00021             }
00022 
00023             const T& getModified() const
00024             {
00025                 return mModified;
00026             }
00027 
00029             void set (const T& value)
00030             {
00031                 mBase = mModified = value;
00032             }
00033 
00035             void setBase (const T& value)
00036             {
00037                 T diff = value - mBase;
00038                 mBase = value;
00039                 mModified += diff;
00040             }
00041 
00043             void setModified (T value, const T& min, const T& max = std::numeric_limits<T>::max())
00044             {
00045                 T diff = value - mModified;
00046 
00047                 if (mBase+diff<min)
00048                 {
00049                     value = min + (mModified - mBase);
00050                     diff = value - mModified;
00051                 }
00052                 else if (mBase+diff>max)
00053                 {
00054                     value = max + (mModified - mBase);
00055                     diff = value - mModified;
00056                 }
00057 
00058                 mModified = value;
00059                 mBase += diff;
00060             }
00061 
00063             void modify (const T& diff)
00064             {
00065                 mModified += diff;
00066             }
00067     };
00068 
00069     template<typename T>
00070     inline bool operator== (const Stat<T>& left, const Stat<T>& right)
00071     {
00072         return left.getBase()==right.getBase() &&
00073             left.getModified()==right.getModified();
00074     }
00075 
00076     template<typename T>
00077     inline bool operator!= (const Stat<T>& left, const Stat<T>& right)
00078     {
00079         return !(left==right);
00080     }

00083     class DynamicStat
00084     {

00086             T mCurrent;

00111                 mCurrent = value;

00115             void setBase (const T& value)
00116             {
00117                 mStatic.setBase (value);

00119                 if (mCurrent>getModified())
00120                     mCurrent = getModified();

00126                 mStatic.setModified (value, min, max);
00127

00135                 mStatic.modify (diff);

00140             {
00141                 mCurrent = value;
00142

00144                     mCurrent = 0;
00145                 else if (mCurrent>getModified())
00146                     mCurrent = getModified();
00147             }
